The quote attributed to Ayn Rand: The question isn’t who is going to let me; it’s who is going to stop me," was found to be misattributed by experts.

The quote: when taken out of context, may be misunderstood as advocating for complete freedom without any limitations, but experts argue that it does not reflect Rand's actual views on individual freedom and responsibility.
